channel.title: Need a code on the full guthan's healing
channel.description: how do I add this also I got the fusion dragon helm how do I make it so I can use red h mask without it being a ammy so incase I want to wear the helm I can dot hat.

item.title: Need a code on the full guthan's healing
item.dc:creator: @Inmate1 Inmate™
item.description:
@Inmate1 wrote:

[code]int guthanheal = misc.random(3);

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ***) //for all parts of guthan && guthanheal == 1) {
NewHP = (hitDiff / 3);
stillgfx(***);
}[/code]

Explanation: When you wear full guthan you have 1/3 chance you can heal (per hit)

Read full topic
item.source: Need a code on the full guthan's healing

item.title: Need a code on the full guthan's healing
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

Basically make it check if the person is wearing all 4 id’s of the armour then add something like

NewHP = playerLevel[3] + (hitDiff);

and a stillgfx.

Read full topic
